table_description: Information about disk descriptions, including ID, name, size, mount path, and timestamps.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the disk.

columns.name: sizeGB
columns.description: The size of the disk in gigabytes.

columns.name: mountPath
columns.description: The mount path of the disk.

columns.name: serviceId
columns.description: The ID of the service associated with the disk.

columns.name: createdAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the disk was created.

columns.name: updatedAt
columns.description: The timestamp of the last update to the disk.
